tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I highly recommend Dr Aarthi Bharath for pregnancy care. I visited her for my second baby pregnancy.

She was very friendly, she would answer to all our queries and concerns very well. She never recommends unnecessary medications. 

One of the best gynac in Banashankari area. She would tell her leave plans also well in advance so that we could easily plan our doctor visits accordingly. She was available on calls even during weekends if we had any issue and she would revert back to us immediately.  It was always so easy to communicate anything with her. 

Even during the surgery she made sure I was comfortable in the OT, then she started the surgery. 

Overall had a nice experience during my entire pregnancy and post pregnancy follow ups too..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Aarthi Bharat for pregnancy care.  *** ** *** **** *** most experienced doctor in Bangalore. She explains in detail for any queries . She always tries to keep us with least medication during pregnancy and with healthy diet . She doesn't suggest any tests unnecessarily. I was travelling from Whitefield for check-ups so she made sure to have minimum visits . On my delivery time i felt so happy and divine with her sweet and kind gestures in OT , she made me to feel so much comfortable as i was very scared. Thank you so much mam ‚ù§Ô∏è

review: Dr Aarthi Bharat is one of those Doctors with both old styled practise and highly experienced with advance techniques like lacroscopy .We were lucky to meet her and she took good care of my wife during ectopic surgery.Also,the follow up was good .We are blessed with a baby boy üôÇ one good thing is she will always trt to avoid medicine as much as possible.Also no unnecessary tests, scans. I would highly recommend her .

review: I visited Dr. Aarati Bharat for my 2nd pregnancy. She guided me throughout my pregnancy from conception to delivery, cleared all my doubts, made me comfortable, she was reachable at all the times when I had a problem during my first trimester.The pregnancy journey was very smooth.I would definitely recommend PPL to visit her.

review:
Doctor is friendly to talk and explain our problems clearly. She starts treatment from the basic one.
Treatment graph goes really well. We can contact her on sundays also in case of serious issues and emergency.  Treatment is cost effective . Trustworthy.

Very much satisfied with the consultation .

review: I would highly recommend Dr.Aarthi Bharat. We wanted to see her no matter wherever she was available either at the hospital or at her clinic ( Raksha clinic) for my tubectomy and also i delivered my second baby from her .
